subject: No receipt
description_text:
Hello, I purchased 
Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter.

The money was taken out of my bank account but I never received the order confirmation, or shipping details, now that they’ve been shipped. I emailed the support team, they created a ticket on December 3, 2025, but never reached back out to me. I would like to know the status of my order or a receipt. 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: hello, I click the link, and there’s no ticket! Sent from my iPhone

Hi Michelle Nava,  Hello, what is your order number? Your goods will be shipped out gradually this week. If you have already placed an order, please wait patiently. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
good morning! Again I never received either of those order numbers, nor receipt, or email or anything! Just the money was taken out of my account. Sent from my iPhone
